jediranger:Amplifier.NAME: Amplifier
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yjediranger:Empower a card, #yjediranger:Empower it by #b%d more.

jediranger:RegularQuiver.NAME: Regular Quiver
jediranger:RegularQuiver.FLAVOR: It actually tastes a bit salty and metallic. Why did you lick a quiver again?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a random #ycommon card containing #y"Arrow" to your hand.
At the start of each combat, choose #b1 of #b3 cards containing #y"Arrow" to add to your hand.
